text:
Under Ant1.7.1 with jdk1.6.0_06, whenever performing Ant task XMLValidate for XML instance validation and implicit external entity resolution, I received following warning message:
Warning: XML resolver not found; external catalogs will be ignored

But the warning message simply disappeared if I switched Ant back to version 1.7.0. 

Is this a compatibility issue?
creator: SpenserKao@optusnet.com.au

text: Just learned that unintentional removal of ant-apache-resolver.jar from Ant 1.7.1's lib subdirectory was the cause behind the error; once patched it back, the problem solved!
creator: SpenserKao@optusnet.com.au
